general.gigTitle: build, rebuild website full stack web app developer, front end developer

sellerCard.description:
Senior Software Engineer | ReactJS, NodeJS, SpringBoot, AI & Digital Marketing

With 6+ years of experience, I offer expert services in ReactJS, NodeJS, SpringBoot, and AI solutions. From innovative web development to effective digital marketing, I deliver high-quality results tailored to your needs. Contact me for top-notch solutions and support for your projects!

description.content:
Are you a startup or business seeking a skilled front-end or Full Stack developer to build, rebuild, or create a functional React.js app using Vite, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, custom SASS, with AI and chatbot integration?


I'm a full stack web developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable websites and web apps. Whether you need a new website, a redesign, or want to create a blog, I deliver fully responsive and high-quality solutions.


My Expertise:

  • Full-Stack Web Development
  • Website Rebuilds & Redesigns
  • AI & Chatbot Integration
  • Responsive, Functional Web Apps
  • Tailored Website Designs
  • Clean Code with Life-Time Maintenance
  • Standard comments
  • Custom Utility CSS (Tailwind/SASS)
  • API Integration


Technologies I Use:

  • React.js (with Vite for faster builds)
  • Java Thymeleaf
  • HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
  • TailwindCSS or SASS
  • Node.js, Spring Boot
  • Python (If Requested)
  • Artificial Intelligence (If Requested)


Why Choose Me?

  • High-quality, detail-oriented work
  • Performance and Security optimization
  • Long-term client relationships with ongoing code maintenance
  • Use standard software development architecture


Lets bring your project to Lifebook a free consultation today!

build, rebuild website full stack web app developer, front end developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide the source code?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide complete access to the source code for your project, ensuring transparency and flexibility in customization. Your satisfaction is my priority, and having the source code empowers you with full control over your application.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer full-stack development services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I specialize in full-stack development, providing end-to-end solutions for seamless and comprehensive web application development (Frontend: ReactJS, Backend: NodeJS or Spring Boot, Database: SQL or MongoDB)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need a detailed requirement document to start the project, including all necessary information.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, All the pages are super mobile-friendly and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you customize or redesign an existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will redesign, customize, or fix errors in an existing website also according to your requirements

packageList.description: 2 Pages - Includes a Landing Page and One Additional Page of Your Choice.
